author: sebor
msg: * makefile.rules (run): To avoid filling up disk space with junk files left
behind by bad programs, created and set TMP to a temporary directory before
running the programs, and then removed it when done.

author: dkulp
msg: Remove some duplicate code, make sure some writers are closed so files aren't locked on windows.

author: jacopoc
msg: Applied patch from Scott Gray OFBIZ-593 to allow to set to null fields from the generic entity maintenance screens.

author: carlos
msg: Readd license header lost in release
